name: Plank Road
description:
In the simulation of plank road, you will learn and master the basic combination of four components, including pedestal, bay, beam and bucket arch. That is, take the foundation as the bottom, the Bay as the column, install the beam on the column, and install the bucket arch on the beam as the top.


In "plank road simulation", you can get away from the busy real life, immerse in this free and relaxing world, challenge levels or create freely.


In the simulation of plank road, you can build and open markets on the plank road, such as inns, wine shops, tea houses, etc.


In plank road simulation, you can
  • Build a prosperous palace city with many temples
  • Building houses looks like a paradise
  • Enjoy a relaxing way to play
